coreAttributes.name: mitsugake
coreAttributes.description: A glove ordinarily meant to assist beginners to youko archery. This one, however, has been enchanted to summon stronger arcane arrows

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the mitsugake on to cover [npc.her] [npc.hand] before wrapping and securing the wrist strap.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the mitsugake onto [npc2.namePos] [npc2.hand] before wrapping and securing the wrist strap.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] the mitsugake onto [npc2.namePos] [npc2.hand] before wrapping and securing the wrist strap.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the mitsugake off of [npc.her] [npc.hand] after unwrapping the wrist strap.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the mitsugake off of [npc2.namePos] [npc2.hand] after unwrapping the wrist strap.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] the mitsugake off of [npc2.namePos] [npc2.hand] after unwrapping the wrist strap.
